name: Southwest Airlines City Hopping - Houston to Dallas on a 737-700 - Full Flight Experience
description:
Welcome to this Full Flight Experience aboard a Boeing 737-700 flight from William P. Hobby Airport in Houston to Dallas Love Field! This frequently flown route ferries Southwest passengers between two of their busiest hubs in the largest cities in Texas. Today, we were treated to beautiful city views of both downtowns under a crystal clear October sky. Even though we were in the air for less than an hour, there was tons to see and take in on this smooth, no-frills flight!

Thanks for flying with me, and enjoy the ride!

Video Timeline
00:00 - Intro
00:30 – Boarding 
00:55 – Pushback and Taxi
01:35 – Takeoff
02:30 – Downtown Houston View and Timelapse
03:30 – Descent and View of Downtown Dallas
04:25 – Landing
07:45 – Gate Arrival
08:20 - End Screen

#flight #southwestairlines #b737 #dallas #houston #hou #dal #flightreview #flightreport 

__________________________________________________________________________________
